item.title: 押注日本央行将按兵不动，日元将创 6 月以来最长连跌纪录
item.description: 由于交易商押注日本央行下周不会加息，日元对美元汇率创下 6 月以来最长连跌纪录。【原文：The yen was headed for its longest losing streak versus the dollar since June as traders bet that the Bank of Japan will refrain from raising interest rates next week.】

item.title: 苹果将于 2025 年初开始在印度南部组装 AirPods
item.description: 苹果公司将于明年初开始首次在印度生产 AirPods 无线耳机，这标志着这家 iPhone 制造商在中国以外稳步推进多元化进程的一个里程碑。【原文：Apple Inc. will begin producing its AirPods wireless earphones in India for the first time early next year, marking a milestone in the iPhone maker’s steady push to diversify beyond China.】

item.title: 鱼类的地狱"：美国斥资十亿美元阻止鲤鱼入侵
item.description:
官员们正在对中西部水道进行武器化，以防止该地区的渔业受到破坏。【原文：

Officials are weaponizing Midwest waterways to prevent a disruption of the region’s fishing industry.

】

item.title: 德国央行称 2025 年德国经济难有增长
item.description: 根据德国联邦银行（Bundesbank）的最新预测，德国经济在今年再次萎缩后，2025 年将很难实现增长。【原文：Germany’s economy will hardly grow in 2025 after shrinking again this year, according to fresh forecasts from Bundesbank.】

item.title: 特斯拉供应商倒闭显示莫桑比克骚乱后果日益严重
item.description: 随着数周来愈演愈烈的选举抗议活动演变成一场叛乱，莫桑比克的经济正陷入困境。【原文：Mozambique’s economy is buckling as weeks of intensifying election protests evolve into a revolt that’s increasingly being felt beyond the borders of the southern African nation.】

item.title: 越南就贪污问题对前总统发出纪律 "警告
item.description: 越南政治局对违反反腐规定的前总统阮春福发出了纪律 "警告"，这是全面反腐运动的最新举措，该运动已使数百名官员和企业高管深陷其中。【原文：Vietnam’s Politburo has issued a disciplinary “warning” to former president Nguyen Xuan Phuc for violating anti-corruption regulations, the latest step in a sweeping anti-graft campaign that has ensnared hundreds of officials and business executives.】

item.title: 据说性感茶叶计划在美国上市而非在香港上市
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，湖南茶跃文化产业发展集团有限公司（又称 "性感茶"）正寻求在美国而非香港进行首次公开募股。【原文：Hunan Chayue Cultural Industry Development Group Ltd., also known as Sexy Tea, is looking to do an initial public offering in the US instead of Hong Kong, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 亨索尔特希望在加强防守的同时雇佣无人问津的汽车团队
item.description: Hensoldt AG 正在洽谈从两家汽车零部件供应商处招聘多达 100 名员工，因为这家国防承包商希望扩大产能，以满足最近激增的军事订单需求。【原文：Hensoldt AG is in talks to hire full teams of up to 100 workers from two auto parts suppliers as the defense contractor looks to expand capacity to meet the recent surge in military orders.】

item.title: 大华银行财务总监李惠辉离职二十年
item.description: 大华银行（United Overseas Bank Ltd.）首席财务官李惠辉（Lee Wai Fai）在任职二十年后将于明年卸任。【原文：United Overseas Bank Ltd.’s Chief Financial Officer Lee Wai Fai is set to step down next year after two decades in the role.】

item.title: 高级官员称中国人民银行誓言防范外汇冲击
item.description: 中国人民银行的一位高级官员表示，中国人民银行将改进对汇率预期的管理，并在明年防范任何冲击。【原文：The People’s Bank of China will improve how it manages exchange rate expectations and guard against any shocks next year, according to a senior bank official.】

item.title: Tim Latimer 谈解决地热融资问题
item.description:
如何跨越鸿沟。【原文：

How to cross the chasm.

】

item.title: 奇数地块：解决地热融资问题（播客）
item.description: 奇数地块：解决地热融资问题（播客）【原文：Odd Lots: Solving the Financing Problem for Geothermal (Podcast)】

item.title: 土耳其艾德姆集团计划在 2025 年为电网运营商进行 IPO
item.description: 土耳其发电商和配电商 Aydem Enerji Yatirimlari AS 公司正准备在 2025 年上半年首次公开发行其两家公司。【原文：Aydem Enerji Yatirimlari AS, a Turkish power generator and distributor, is preparing initial public offerings for two of its units in the first half of 2025.】

item.title: 卡莱尔获得 3.18 亿美元私人贷款，用于收购废物处理公司股份
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的人士透露，凯雷集团（Carlyle Group Inc.【原文：Carlyle Group Inc. has turned to private credit to finance its acquisition of a majority stake in Australian waste management firm Waste Services Group Pty., according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 菲律宾债券交易所称交易额达到创纪录的 1620 亿美元
item.description: 据菲律宾固定收益交易所称，菲律宾实体发行的比索债券二级市场交易量今年创下了超过1600亿美元的纪录，而且这一势头很可能会持续下去。【原文：Volume traded in the secondary market for peso bonds issued by Philippine entities reached a record of more than $160 billion this year, according to the nation’s fixed-income bourse, with the momentum likely to be sustained.】

item.title: 泰国将从 2025 年起对大型国际公司征收最低税
item.description: 泰国财政部长披差-春哈瓦吉拉（Pichai Chunhavajira）周五在接受当地电视节目采访时表示，泰国计划从明年起对大型国际公司实行 15%的最低企业税率。【原文：Thailand plans to apply a minimum corporate tax rate of 15% on big international companies from next year, Finance Minister Pichai Chunhavajira said in an interview with a local TV program on Friday.】

item.title: 中国的 "长期低价 "承诺让债券陷入未知数
item.description: 中国 11 万亿美元的政府债券市场已进入未知领域，因为新时期的货币政策引发了关于收益率将从历史低点进一步下降多少的争论。【原文：China’s $11 trillion government bond market has moved into uncharted territory as a new era of monetary policy opens up debate over how much further yields will fall from record lows.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利将购买 9 亿欧元桑坦德抵押贷款
item.description: 据知情人士透露，摩根士丹利即将达成协议，从桑坦德银行（Banco Santander SA）购买约 9 亿欧元（约合 9.4 亿美元）的西班牙抵押贷款。【原文：Morgan Stanley is close to an agreement to buy around €900 million ($940 million) in Spanish mortgages from Banco Santander SA, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: Seplat 将重启埃克森公司数百口闲置的尼日利亚老油井
item.description: Seplat Energy Plc 完成收购埃克森美孚公司在西非国家的陆上石油和天然气资产后，将重启数百口闲置的尼日利亚油井。【原文：Seplat Energy Plc will revive hundreds of idle Nigerian oil wells after completing its purchase of Exxon Mobil Corp.’s onshore oil and gas assets in the West African nation.】

item.title: 欧洲央行卡扎克称必要时可能大幅降息
item.description: 欧洲中央银行管理委员会成员马丁斯-卡扎克表示，如果经济发展需要，可以扩大降息规模。【原文：European Central Bank Governing Council member Martins Kazaks said the size of interest-rate reductions could be increased should economic developments warrant it.】

item.title: 中国煤炭价格跌至年内低点，经济刺激政策令人失望
item.description: 由于政府提振经济的努力未能重振疲软的需求，为数百万家庭和工厂提供电力的中国主要燃料价格创下了一年多来的最低水平。【原文：The price of China’s mainstay fuel, powering millions of homes and factories, has hit the lowest level in over a year, as the government’s efforts to boost the economy fail to revive tepid demand.】

item.title: 南非自 2022 年以来首次实现市场外资净流入
item.description: 南非报告称，在致力于促进经济增长的联合政府的鼓励下，外国投资者自 2022 年以来首次净流入其债务和股票市场。【原文：South Africa reported the first net inflows by foreign investors to its debt and equity markets since 2022, encouraged by a coalition government committed to boosting economic growth.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长维勒鲁瓦认为在利率不再受限之前将有更多降息举措
item.description: 欧洲央行理事会成员弗朗索瓦-维勒鲁瓦-德-加尔豪（Francois Villeroy de Galhau）表示，欧洲央行将在 2025 年进一步降低借贷成本，距离货币政策不再具有限制性还有一段路要走。【原文：The European Central Bank will lower borrowing costs further in 2025 and there is some way to go before monetary policy stops being restrictive, according to Governing Council member Francois Villeroy de Galhau.】

item.title: 印尼盾跌破 1 美元兑 16000 印尼盾的关键水平
item.description: 印尼盾跌破了 1 美元兑 16,000 印尼盾的关键心理价位，这给印尼央行施加了更大的压力，迫使其加强对印尼盾的保护。【原文：The Indonesian rupiah dropped past the key psychological level of 16,000 per dollar, escalating pressure on the central bank to ramp up its defense of the currency.】

item.title: 英国经济在第四季度初意外萎缩
item.description: 英国经济在 10 月份连续第二个月出现萎缩，原因是消费者要为痛苦的预算做准备，这延续了首相基尔-斯塔默（Keir Starmer）领导的工党新政府令人失望的增长数字。【原文：Britain’s economy contracted for a second straight month in October as consumers braced for a painful budget, extending a disappointing run of growth figures under Prime Minister Keir Starmer’s new Labour government.】

item.title: 欧洲股市将在华尔街阴影下再战一年
item.description: 欧洲股票多头希望明年该地区的股票能缩小与美国股票高回报的差距，但他们注定要失望了。【原文：European stock bulls looking for the region’s equities to close the gap on superior returns in the US next year are set for disappointment.】

item.title: 澳大利亚移民人数两年来首次下降
item.description: 周五的官方数据显示，自澳大利亚取消科维德时代的边境限制以来，移民澳大利亚的人数首次出现下降，主要原因是留学生人数的下降。【原文：The number of people migrating to Australia fell for the first time since the country lifted its Covid-era border restrictions, led by a drop in international student arrivals, official figures showed Friday.】

item.title: 欧洲要么努力工作，要么面临几乎无增长的局面
item.description: 据美国经济咨商局（The Conference Board）称，除非欧洲领导人开始着手改革，并为私人投资的大幅增长创造条件，否则欧洲将面临严峻的经济前景。【原文：Europe faces dire economic prospects unless its leaders start tackling reforms and put the conditions in place for a significant increase in private investment, according to The Conference Board.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英镑在 10 月 GDP 数据公布前走软
据说凯雷正在孟买酝酿对 Quest Global 进行 10 亿美元的首次公开募股
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士透露，凯雷集团（Carlyle Group Inc.【原文：Carlyle Group Inc. is considering an initial public offering of engineering services firm Quest Global Services Pte in India, people familiar with the matter said, amid increasing investor interest in the nation’s stock market.】
